titleStmt.title: Promiscuous ordinations are destructive to the honour & safety of the Church of England (if they should be allowed in it). Written in a letter to a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Pearson, John, 1613-1686.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to John Pearson.
Imperfect: pages stained with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
